items.name: Bramble Grip
implicitMods: Curse Enemies with Elemental Weakness on Hit
explicitMods: +68 to Strength
+64 to Dexterity
+60 to maximum Life
Regenerate 5.3 Mana per second
+22% to Lightning Resistance
craftedMods: Non-Channelling Skills have -7 to Total Mana Cost

implicitMods: +18% Chance to Block Attack Damage while wielding a Staff

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill gem. Once this gem reaches level 2 or above, will raise the quality of supported gems. Cannot support skills that don't come from gems.
explicitMods: +8% to Quality of Supported Skill Gems
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Profane Proxy
explicitMods: +3 to Level of Socketed Curse Gems
+29% to Cold Resistance
+30% to Lightning Resistance
Left Ring Slot: Your Chilling Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
Right Ring Slot: Your Shocking Skitterbot's Aura applies Socketed Hex Curse instead
flavourText: The machines do not hate. They merely serve one who does.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Cold, Curse, Hex

socketedItems.secDescrText: Curses all targets in an area, lowering their cold resistance and giving them a chance to be frozen when hit.
explicitMods: Base duration is 11.80 seconds
+1 metre to radius
11% increased Effect of Curse
Cursed enemies have -36% to Cold Resistance
Hits against Cursed Enemies have +25% chance to Freeze
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Deals chaos damage to a single enemy, dealing more damage if they are Hexed, then removing the Hex. If the enemy was Hexed, also deals area damage to other enemies around the target, boosting damage and removing Hexes from those enemies in the same way.
explicitMods: Deals 1697 to 2545 Chaos Damage
This Spell's Cast Time is added to its Cooldown if Triggered
10% increased Area of Effect
All Damage can Ignite, Freeze, and Shock
Chaos Damage with Hits is Resisted by lowest Resistance instead
40% more Damage with Ailments if Enemy is Hexed

100% more Damage with Hits if Enemy is Hexed
Removes a Hex after Damaging
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports spells, or attacks that use bows or wands. Instead of using that skill, you will throw a mine that will use the skill for you when you detonate it. Mines cannot use channelling skills.
explicitMods: Supported Attack Skills cannot be used with Melee Weapons
Mine lasts 5 seconds
Supported Skills have 10% increased Mine Throwing Speed
Supported Skills gain a Base Reservation equal to Base Mana and Life Cost
Supported Skills have a Base Mine Detonation Time of 0.25 seconds
Supported Skills deal 50% less Damage
Each Mine from Supported Skills applies 2% chance to deal Double Damage to Hits against Enemies near it, up to a maximum of 100%

properties.name: Trap, Mine, Spell, Minion, Cold, Lightning, AoE, Aura

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Chilling Skitterbot and a Shocking Skitterbot, which will trigger your traps and detonate your mines. Mines detonated by Skitterbots will re-arm and can then be detonated again. The Skitterbots grant you more trap and mine damage, and cannot be targeted or damaged.
explicitMods: 120% increased Minion Movement Speed
Minions have 20% increased Chill Effect
Minions have 20% increased Shock Effect
Maximum 1 Summoned Skitterbot of each type
Chilling Skitterbot's Aura Chills Enemies near it
Shocking Skitterbot's Aura Shocks Enemies near it
Skitterbots grant 10% more Trap and Mine Damage
socketedItems.descrText: Place into an item socket of the right colour to gain this skill. Right click to remove from a socket.

properties.name: Spell, AoE, Duration, Movement, Lightning, Travel

socketedItems.secDescrText: Waits for a duration before teleporting to a targeted destination, with the duration based on the distance and your movement speed. When the teleport occurs, lightning damage is dealt to the area around both where the player was and where they teleported to. Casting again will queue up multiple teleportations to occur in sequence.
explicitMods: Deals 57 to 1077 Lightning Damage
+0.5 metres to radius
Can queue up to 50 uses
50% reduced Duration
10% less Duration
